name: head-north
description: Head North - Unified Frontend and Backend Monorepo

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:apps && npm run install:packages
scripts.install:apps: npm run install:web && npm run install:api
scripts.install:packages: npm run install:types && npm run install:utils && npm run install:config && npm run install:jira-primitives
scripts.dev:packages: concurrently "npm run dev:types" "npm run dev:utils" "npm run dev:config" "npm run dev:jira-primitives"
scripts.stop: npm run stop:api && npm run stop:web
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:types && npm run build:utils && npm run build:config && npm run build:jira-primitives
scripts.build:packages:parallel: npm run build:types & npm run build:utils & npm run build:config & npm run build:jira-primitives & wait
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:packages && npm run test:apps
scripts.test:packages: npm run test:types && npm run test:utils && npm run test:config && npm run test:jira-primitives
scripts.test:packages:parallel: concurrently "npm run test:types" "npm run test:utils" "npm run test:config" "npm run test:jira-primitives"
scripts.test:apps: npm run test:web && npm run test:api
scripts.test:types: cd packages/types && npm run test || echo 'No tests for types package'
scripts.test:utils: cd packages/utils && npm run test || echo 'No tests for utils package'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:packages && npm run lint:apps
scripts.lint:packages: npm run lint:types && npm run lint:utils && npm run lint:config && npm run lint:jira-primitives
scripts.lint:apps: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:api
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:packages && npm run type-check:api && npm run type-check:web
scripts.type-check:packages: npm run type-check:types && npm run type-check:utils && npm run type-check:config && npm run type-check:jira-primitives
scripts.clean: rm -rf apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules tools/*/node_modules node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/dist
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:api
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint:fix && npm run format:check
scripts.dev:check: npm run type-check && npm run lint:fix
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.fresh: npm run reset && npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.dev:with-check: npm run validate:env && npm run dev
scripts.analyze:all: npm run analyze:unused && npm run analyze:deps

author: Michael Wagner-Kulovits
